member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush.GetBitmap
member.summary: Gets the bitmap source that this brush uses to paint.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address to a pointer to the bitmap with which this brush paints.

member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush.GetExtendModeX
member.summary: Gets the method by which the brush horizontally tiles those areas that extend past its bitmap.
member.returns: A value that specifies how the brush horizontally tiles those areas that extend past its bitmap.

member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush.GetExtendModeY
member.summary: Gets the method by which the brush vertically tiles those areas that extend past its bitmap.
member.returns: A value that specifies how the brush vertically tiles those areas that extend past its bitmap.

member.name: ID2D1BitmapBrush.GetInterpolationMode
member.summary: Gets the interpolation method used when the brush bitmap is scaled or rotated.
member.returns: The interpolation method used when the brush bitmap is scaled or rotated.
